name: Samsung Slimline CD-ROM Drive
des: A slim and compact CD-ROM drive from Samsung, suitable for laptops and desktops that require basic optical disc reading capabilities.

name: Samsung External USB CD-ROM Drive
des: An external CD-ROM drive with USB connectivity from Samsung, designed for laptops and computers without built-in optical drives.

name: Samsung Internal CD-ROM Drive
des: An internal CD-ROM drive for desktop computers from Samsung, offering reliable disc reading capabilities for various applications.

name: Samsung Compact Disc Reader
des: A compact CD-ROM drive from Samsung, suitable for ultrabooks and devices with limited space. Offers basic optical disc reading functionality.
